Text: The Basset Bleu de Gascogne (] ), also known as the Blue Gascony Basset, is a long-backed, short legged breed of dog of the hound type.

<Text: Basset Bleu de Gascogne:  The breed originated in the Middle Ages, descended from the Grand Bleu de Gascogne.>

Text: Basset Bleu de Gascogne:  It is recognized internationally by the Fédération Cynologique Internationale, in the UK by The Kennel Club, and by the United Kennel Club in the United States.

<Text: Basset Bleu de Gascogne:  The "bleu" of its name is a reference to its coat which has a ticked appearance.>
